data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 27981 / [SUPER SPECIFIC] Microsoft Edge 44.17763.1.0 Microsoft EdgeHTML 18.17763
data.actual_result: The modals for the Rich Presence are popping out and is broken
data.expected_result: The modals for the Rich Presence are supposed to be displayed correctly
data.short_description: Rich Presence Modal pops out when speculated through Microsoft Edge
data.steps_to_repro: - Get Microsoft Edge - Go to Discord web client- Login - Go to any random server you would prefer - Check for a Rich Presence that you or your friend has - Click on their profile - Click on the game (The title) - There is a list of ones that I've found: Fortnite, League of Legends, Minecraft, Grand Theft Auto V, The Sims 3, Destiny 2 (This list may work or not for you, it worked for me) - Watch attachment if you are confused - More information: I have submitted this bug earlier but got denied two times from two individuals because they were on EdgeHTML 17 while I was on EdgeHTML 18, it's specific!!! This EdgeHTML version is acquired through the Windows 10 1809 update...
